overview.problemStatement: Is there some function f" role="presentation" style="position: relative;">fff such that for all k≥1" role="presentation" style="position: relative;">k≥1k≥1k\geq 1 if a finite graph G" role="presentation" style="position: relative;">GGG has chromatic number ≥f(k)" role="presentation" style="position: relative;">≥f(k)≥f(k)\geq f(k) then G" role="presentation" style="position: relative;">GGG has k" role="presentation" style="position: relative;">kkk edge disjoint cycles on the same set of vertices?
